summary: The diff does not implement the requested minimal IC workspace scaffold. No new root-level package.json or dfx.json was added, and backend code was modified despite the explicit constraint not to change backend files. The diff also includes unrelated frontend/style and metadata changes beyond the requested minimal file presence checks.

missing_requirements.reason: No package.json was added (and none is shown as modified), so the required root-level package.json and build scripts cannot be verified as implemented.
evidence: <file-diff>: MODIFIED FILES list does not include package.json

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a minimal root-level dfx.json defining backend and frontend assets canisters; reference backend/main.mo; do not change backend code; no deployment attempt.
missing_requirements.reason: No dfx.json was added (and none is shown as modified). Additionally, backend/main.mo was modified, violating the constraint/AC that backend code not be edited as part of this work.
evidence: <file-diff>: MODIFIED FILES list does not include dfx.json

hallucinated_features.description: Backend code changes in backend/main.mo despite the requirement/constraint to not change backend logic or files.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids changing backend files (including backend/main.mo), but the diff modifies backend/main.mo.
